trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Bradford
There were no other sightings in Bradford on or around July 25th 2009
divs: Sighting Details We saw bright orange light through window,went outside to get better view,it was approx 150ft above rooftops.As it travelled towards us it began to climb. It went over the roof of my house continuing to ascend until it disappeared into the clouds.This was witnessed by my neighbours plus visitors and all my family. 9 people in all. we thought at first it could have been a hot air balloon,because it had a bright yellow flame in the middle.But it had no basket and it had blue and red lights flashing round it. Thank you Margaret O'Neill
Summary: Bright orange sphere seen by 9 witnesses
